trends: There has been one other sighting in Willard
There were no other sightings in Willard on or around November 30th 1996
Summary: saw five large bright lights move from south to north at low altitude
divs: Sighting Detailsthis happened when i was 12 and playing night football with some friends at Auburn Lake Recreational Park on US103. the ball had been mis thrown towards the hill of the lake and I went to retrieve it. I heard a low hum getting louder as it approached. From the south 5 very bright light moved at high speed heading north. the lights were in the pattern of a "house" shape. we all seen it, but to this day, they deny it. it didnt look like a plane or jet flying low. these lights i seen all the way in the northern horizon. i didnt know what it was at first. whatever the object was, it moved straight without stopping. i felt dazed, but not too dazed. i looked down at the others only to notice that they didnt move, like they had froze staring at it. i ran up the hill. the object didnt stop.
